title: Increase Save V2 liquidation amount
body:
It is proposed to begin a discussion with the community about increasing the maximum amount of COMP, AAVE and other lending platform tokens earned via SAVE that can be liquidated each week. The current maximum is USD $5,000 worth of tokens each week. It is proposed to increase this parameter.

This would be done by posting an MCCP and beginning a discussion on the forum to refine how much in total should be liquidated on a weekly basis. Initial projections indicate doubling the amount to $10,000 could be a suitable increase, and result in a meaningful uplift in Save APY.

The MCCP is in the process of being drafted, and will be ready to share upon the completion of this vote. 

**Should the ProtocolDAO suggest to increase the Save V2 token liquidation amount?**
author: 0xD8baE7d96df905E46718B6ceE3410F535e11bF20
